  • Constructor Details

    • ServerHandler

      public ServerHandler(Socket socket, Game model, GameController controller, boolean creator, First lock, ServerListener serverOne)
      Constructs a new ServerHandler object with the provided parameters.
      Parameters:
      socket - the socket representing the connection with the client
      model - the game model
      controller - the game controller
      creator - indicates whether the ServerHandler is for the creator of the game
      lock - the lock object used for synchronization
      serverOne - the server listener for communication with the server

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Starts the execution of the ServerHandler in a separate thread. This method is called when the thread is started. It reads incoming objects from the client and analyzes them. If a communication or class not found error occurs, appropriate actions are taken.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the ping timer. If a timer is already running, it will be canceled and a new timer will be created.

    • receivedPong

      public void receivedPong()
      Receives a ping from the client and resets the timer. If a timer is running, it will be canceled and a new timer will be started.

    • interrupt

      public void interrupt()
      Interrupts the timer. If a timer is running, it will be canceled.

    • getNickname

      public String getNickname()
      Returns the nickname associated with this ServerHandler.
      Returns:
      the nickname associated with this ServerHandler

    • numberOfParticipantsSetting

      public void numberOfParticipantsSetting(int n) throws RemoteException
      Sets the number of participants for the game and performs the necessary actions based on the number of players.
      Parameters:
      n - the number of participants to be set
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs during the method execution

    • printGame

      public void printGame()
      Sends the game view of the current player to the client. The game view contains the current state of the game for the player. The game view is sent through the output stream to the client. If an IOException occurs during the communication, the stack trace is printed.
      Specified by:
      printGame in interface ModelListener

    • warning

      public void warning(Warnings e, Player currentPlayer)
      Sends a warning message to the client player.
      Specified by:
      warning in interface ModelListener
      Parameters:
      e - the warning type to be sent
      currentPlayer - the current player object associated with the warning

    • newTurn

      public void newTurn(Player currentPlayer)
      Notifies the client player about a new turn.
      Specified by:
      newTurn in interface ModelListener
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - the current player object associated with the new turn

    • askOrder

      public void askOrder()
      Asks the client player to choose the order tiles to drop in the shelf. This method is called when it is the client player's turn. It sends a request to the client player to choose the order of play. The client player should respond with the chosen order.
      Specified by:
      askOrder in interface ModelListener
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an IOException occurs during the communication

    • isLastTurn

      public void isLastTurn()
      Notifies the client player that it is the last turn of the game. This method sends a notification to the client player indicating that the current turn is the last turn of the game. The client player is also provided with the nickname of the current player.
      Specified by:
      isLastTurn in interface ModelListener

    • askColumn

      public void askColumn()
      Asks the client player to choose a column for placing a tile. This method is called when it is the client player's turn. It sends a request to the client player to choose a column for placing a tile. The client player should respond with the chosen column.
      Specified by:
      askColumn in interface ModelListener

    • askAction

      public void askAction()
      Asks the client player to choose their next action. This method is called when it is the client player's turn. It sends a request to the client player to choose their next action. The client player should respond with their chosen action.
      Specified by:
      askAction in interface ModelListener
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an IOException occurs during the communication

    • gameStarted

      public void gameStarted(Player currentPlayer)
      Notifies the client player that the game has started. This method is called when the game starts. It sends a notification to the client player indicating that the game has started. It invokes the `newTurn()` method to inform the client player that it is their turn.
      Specified by:
      gameStarted in interface ModelListener
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - the player whose turn it is

    • warning

      public void warning(Warnings errorType, String nickname)
      Sends a warning message to the client player. This method is called to notify the client player about a specific warning.
      Specified by:
      warning in interface ModelListener
      Parameters:
      errorType - the type of warning to send
      nickname - the nickname of the client player
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an IOException occurs during the communication

    • playerDisconnected

      public void playerDisconnected(String nickname)
      Notifies the client players that a player has disconnected from the game. This method is called when a player disconnects, and it sends a message to all client players to inform them about the disconnection. If there is only one player remaining in the game, it sends a message to the remaining player to wait for more players to join.
      Specified by:
      playerDisconnected in interface ModelListener
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the disconnected player
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an IOException occurs during the communication

    • playerReconnected

      public void playerReconnected(String nickname)
      Notifies the client players that a player has reconnected to the game. This method is called when a player reconnects, and it sends a message to all client players to inform them about the reconnection.
      Specified by:
      playerReconnected in interface ModelListener
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the reconnected player
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an IOException occurs during the communication

    • resumingTurn

      public void resumingTurn()
      Notifies the client player that their turn is being resumed. This method is called when a player's turn is being resumed after a reconnection, and it sends a message to the client player to inform them about the resumption of their turn.
      Specified by:
      resumingTurn in interface ModelListener
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an IOException occurs during the communication

    • finalPoints

      public void finalPoints(String winnerNickname) throws RuntimeException
      Sends the final points to the client player. This method is called at the end of the game to send the final points of all players to the client player. The final points are represented as a map with player nicknames as keys and their corresponding points as values.
      Specified by:
      finalPoints in interface ModelListener
      Parameters:
      winnerNickname - the nickname of the winner
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an IOException occurs during the communication

    • setClientID

      public void setClientID(int clientID)
      Sets the ID of the client.
      Parameters:
      clientID - the ID of the client to be set
